EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_Omni-channelRetailE-Book_Q114.Nurture #1: Case Studies Handout
EmailTemplate.subject: Check out Omni-Channel Tactics at Work: Following up on the Omnichannel eBook You Downloaded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Your business is interested in adopting an omni-channel retailing strategy - but how?
Review these case studies and learn from the leaders in retail. See how omni-channel practices like gamification, big data tactics and digitally enhanced shopping experiences have driven more traffic and sales.
Get the case studies here <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL_Handout_OmniChannel_Tactics_at_Work.pdf>.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
